channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Book App Used AI to ‘Roast’ Its Users. It Went Anti-Woke Instead

item.title: Best Headphones for Working Out (2025): Beats, Bose, Shokz, JLab
item.description: Rock your inner jock with a pair of sturdy, sweatproof, and tangle-proof headphones. Here are our favorites.

item.title: Californians Say X Blocked Them From Viewing Amber Alert About Missing 14-Year-Old
item.description: Many people reported they hit a screen preventing them from seeing the alert unless they signed in.

item.title: USB-C Is Now the Law of the Land in Europe
item.description: Apple has already pulled devices to comply with the European Commission’s new Common Charger Directive.

item.title: Inside the wild fall and last-minute revival of Bench, the VC-backed accounting startup that imploded over the holidays

item.title: These fintech companies are hiring in 2025 after a turbulent year
item.description: While the rapid pace of funding has slowed, many fintechs are continuing to see growth and expand their teams. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved....

item.title: Elon Musk Is Posting Nonstop Falsehoods About 'Grooming Gangs'
item.description: Musk’s posts, which have racked up hundreds of millions of views on X, are his latest effort at inserting himself into UK politics.
